main event: A reported UFO sighting in Akron, Ohio, on 21 March 1961.
interesting points: The object was described as giving off sparks and appearing white in color., The report included claims of multiple calls to a local radio station from other viewers., A local UFO researcher was involved but did not personally see the object., Witnesses were named in the report, although their testimonies are not detailed., The sighting lasted for approximately 10-15 minutes according to separate records.
witness description: A local UFO researcher who was contacted about the sighting.
